attributes.action: to askthe greek goverment to put its animal welfare agreement into practice and stop the killing of dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the past few months there as been many dogs killed and hanged and left to die without proper animal protection.i feel its our duty to help and put a end to this barbaric act,as we are in the e.u and the greeks are our neighbours..lets make a moral choice and act with compassion towards all who need our help in their hour of need..let britain be the light when then the shadows fall for all living things...
